name: ePortfolio
description: This site is created with AngularJS, using design paradigms such as Atomic CSS and Mobile First design. This Angular web-app utilizes libraries such as Bootstrap and html5-boilerplate as well as tools like Karma, Bower, Jasmine and Protractor. Download the source code as .zip by clicking the thumbnail. Installation instructions are inside.

name: HatsuRebals
skill: Video Editing, UX Design, Project Management
description: HatsuRebals consists of a small group of friends playing computer games. We connect via Skype and play online. At times I record the games and if there is some interesting action, I will edit a short clip or a video story and post it on our Youtube channel. I also maintain the Youtube channel and the HatsuRebals email box.

name: Kebnekaise Trailer
description: We attempted to climb the North Europes highest mountain, Kebnekaise, with a three-man group in the fall of 2012. With us, we had three GoPro HD Hero 2 Action cameras. I edited a fictional action movie trailer out of the material we recorded on that trip.

name: GoPro HD Hero Test Session
description: Testing of GoPro HD Hero 2 Action camera and new fishing gear. I edited a short "music video" out of the recorded material on a sunny day at a finnish lake.

name: PC Hankintaopas
description: A project in Tampere University of Applied Sciences. My whole class got an assignment to create a PC buyers guide for regular consumers. I worked as an imaginary Project Manager in this assignment. I divided the class to teams according to their interests and skills and organized the work. I took care of schedules and reacted accordingly if there were any problems or delays. The guide is in finnish.
